original: A fake item for all staves.
A sturdy stone wall. A small light has been affixed to it.
translation: 坚固的石墙。一盏小灯被贴在上面。

original: Ye wand hath been forged frome the chitin of some foul daemon, wielding their powere!
translation: 你的魔杖是用某个邪恶恶魔的甲壳质锻造而成，挥舞着他们的力量！

original: A slender wooden staff with a mana crystal socket at the head that casts a spell when activated.  This stave casts magic missile.
translation: 一种细长的木棍，头部有法力水晶套，激活后可以施放法术。这把棍子发射魔法导弹。

original: A wooden staff with a mana crystal socket at the head that casts a spell when activated.  This stave casts magic missile.
translation: 一种木制的棍子，头部有法力水晶套，激活后可以施放法术。这把棍子发射魔法导弹。

original: A slender wooden staff with a mana crystal socket at the head that casts a spell when activated.  This stave casts gravity well.
translation: 一种细长的木棍，头部有法力水晶套，激活后可以施放法术。这个壁能很好地释放重力。

translation: 生物医药公司酸性喷雾的更大冷却壁

original: A slender wooden stave with a mana crystal socket at the head that casts a spell when activated.  This stave casts paralytic dart.
translation: 一个细长的木制冷却壁，头部有一个魔法水晶插座，启动时会施放一个咒语。这个板条铸造了麻痹镖。

original: A wooden stave with a mana crystal socket at the head that casts a spell when activated.  This stave casts paralytic dart.
translation: 一个头部有魔法水晶插座的木制冷却壁，启动时会施放一个咒语。这个板条铸造了麻痹镖。

original: A slender wooden stave with a mana crystal socket at the head that casts a spell when activated.  This stave casts zombie pack.
translation: 一个细长的木制冷却壁，头部有一个魔法水晶插座，启动时会施放一个咒语。这个冷却壁铸造僵尸包。

original: A wooden stave with a mana crystal socket at the head that casts a spell when activated.  This stave casts zombie pack.
translation: 一个头部有魔法水晶插座的木制冷却壁，启动时会施放一个咒语。这个冷却壁铸造僵尸包。

original: Once a normal human, now risen from its grave. It would appear to be completely normal, other than the spells its preparing to cast.
translation: 曾经是正常人，现在从坟墓里复活。这看起来是完全正常的，除了准备施展的法术。

original: Through reserch probably done by some basement-dwelling neckbeard of whom knew magic, you have become an orc. Strike forth, and bring honor to Malacath!
translation: 通过研究，也许是某个地下室的人，知道魔法，你已经成为一个兽人。向前冲，把荣誉带给玛拉卡！

original: A sub-school of Animism, those of this focus of study have opted to shift their focus away from Blood Magic, summoning, and the undead, instead focusing upon the summoning of other creatures and other areas of Animism. To specialize in this manner, one gains acess to many fantastical creatures which may be summoned, as well as others.
translation: 作为万物有灵论的一个分支，这些研究重点的人选择了将他们的注意力从血魔法、召唤和不死生物转移，而不是集中在其他生物的召唤和万物有灵论的其他领域。以这种方式专精，一个人可以接触到许多可以召唤的幻想生物，以及其他生物。

original: A dark green, mutagenic substance, seemingly magical in nature. One may aqquire *unique* mutations from its ingestion.
translation: 一种深绿色的致突变物质，在性质上看起来很神奇。人们可能从它的摄入中获得独特的突变。

original: You dream of smoked meats and strong drink.
translation: 你梦见烟熏肉和烈性饮料。

original: You dream of hunting various mammailia, your friends beside you.
translation: 你梦想着猎杀各种各样的妈咪，你身边的朋友。

original: Your attunement to magic has heightened itself, allowing for mroe effective spell use.
translation: 你对魔法的调音提高了自身，允许mroe有效地使用法术。

original: A wave of mana crashes upon your shores.
translation: 一股法力冲击你的海岸。

original: A field of battle rages around you, as adrenaline courses through you.
translation: 一片战场在你周围肆虐，肾上腺素在你身上流动。

original: Music plays, as you chug various beverages with various friends.
translation: 音乐播放，当你和各种各样的朋友喝各种饮料。

original: Your muscles and bones appear to have hardened.
translation: 你的肌肉和骨骼似乎变硬了。

original: A specialization of the Animist school, Necromancers focus upon the conjuration of minions, including the raising of dead. To specialize in this manner, one gains acess to a plethora of powerful, semi-necrotic spells.
translation: 作为泛灵论学派的一个专业，亡灵巫师专注于召唤仆从，包括复活死人。以这种方式专精，你将获得大量强大的、半坏死的法术。

original: A light blue slurry, seemingly magical in nature. It appears to glow.
translation: 一种浅蓝色的泥浆，看起来很神奇。它似乎在发光。

original: A tall, strong Orc visits you within an unkown plane, speaking words of encouragement, and the embracement of your true nature.
translation: 一个高大强壮的兽人在一个未知的平面内拜访你，说鼓励的话，拥抱你的真实本性。

original: You now know what life truly is, leaving behind your weak form. Glory to Malacath!
translation: 你现在知道了生命的真谛，离开了你脆弱的身体。荣耀属于玛拉卡！

original: You are able to store a little more mana in your body than usual.
translation: 你可以在你的身体里储存比平时多一点的法力。

original: The density of your muscles and skin have increased, providing an improved bonus to ones health.
translation: 你的肌肉和皮肤的密度增加了，为你的健康提供了更好的奖励。

original: A sub-school of Kelvinism, those who specialize such have shifted focus upon the use of flames in spellcasting.
translation: 凯尔文主义的一个分支学校，专门研究这类问题的人已经把注意力转移到了施法中火焰的使用上。

original: You dream of riding an owlbear.
You dream of blue mushrooms growing beneath a tree.
translation: 你梦见树下长着蓝蘑菇。

original: You are able to store more mana in your body than usual.
translation: 你能在你的身体里储存比平常更多的法力。

original: You stand within a workshop, various objects around you, in front of you lies an unfinished wand.
translation: 你站在一个车间里，各种各样的东西围绕着你，面前放着一根未完成的魔杖。

original: Strolling through the halls of an academy, you observe apprintices practice magic, and grinding flourescent fungi.
translation: 漫步在一所学院的大厅里，你可以观察到有人在练习魔法，磨着荧光菌。

original: Fireballs and magic missiles fly about you, as lightning roars from the heavens, rending that below.
translation: 火球和魔法飞弹围绕着你飞来飞去，就像闪电从天上咆哮，撕碎了下面的一切。

original: You wield arcane powers which few other mages know of. Your spells readied, potions stocked, and wands recharged, you venture into the unknown.
translation: 你拥有其他法师所知的奥术异能。你的咒语准备就绪，药水储备充足，魔杖充电，你冒险进入未知。

original: Your muscles have become extremely dense, as well as your skin, providing major boosts to health.
translation: 你的肌肉和皮肤都变得非常密集，这对健康有很大的促进作用。

original: A sub-school of Kelvinism, those who specialize such have shifted focus upon the use of frost.
translation: 作为凯尔文主义的一个分支，那些专门研究霜的人已经把注意力转移到霜的使用上。

original: You are able to store a lot more mana in your body than usual.
translation: 你能在你的身体里储存比平常更多的法力。

original: Your natural endurance has increased somewhat.
translation: 你天生的耐力有所提高。

original: You are able to store a little less mana in your body than usual.
translation: 你可以在你的身体里储存比平常少一点的法力。

original: You are able to store less mana in your body than usual.
translation: 你能在你的身体里储存比平常更少的法力。

original: You are able to store a lot less mana in your body than usual.
translation: 你能在你身体里储存的法力比平时少得多。

original: Your natural mana regeneration is slightly faster than normal.
translation: 你的自然法力恢复速度比正常情况稍微快一点。

original: Your natural mana regeneration is faster than normal.
translation: 你的自然法力恢复速度比平常快。

original: Your natural mana regeneration is much faster than normal.
translation: 你的自然法力恢复速度比正常情况快得多。

original: Your natural mana regeneration is slightly slower than normal.
translation: 你的自然法力回复比正常情况稍微慢一点。

original: Your natural mana regeneration is slower than normal.
translation: 你的自然法力恢复比正常情况下慢。

original: Your natural mana regeneration is much slower than normal.
translation: 你的自然法力恢复比正常情况慢得多。

original: You can sense the mana in your body slightly better than normal, allowing you to tap into more of your reserves.
translation: 你可以感觉到你身体里的法力比平时稍微好一点，这样你就可以利用更多的储备。

original: You can sense the mana in your body better than normal, allowing you to tap into more of your reserves.
translation: 你可以感觉到你身体的法力比正常情况下更好，让你可以利用更多的储备。

original: You can sense the mana in your body much better than normal, allowing you to tap into more of your reserves.
translation: 你可以感觉到你身体里的法力比正常情况要好得多，这样你就可以利用更多的储备。

original: You have a hard time sensing the mana in your body, making less of your reserves available for use.
translation: 你很难感觉到你身体里的法力，从而减少你的储备。

original: Gives all of the debug spells at max level.
translation: 在最大级别上给出所有调试咒语。

original: Your attunement to the Magi allows one to summon an ethereal hand.
translation: 你对三博士的调谐允许你召唤一只以太之手。

original: Your attunement to the Magi allows one to blast opponents to the ground.
translation: 你对东方三博士的调音允许你将对手炸倒在地。

original: A young owlbear hatches to serve you.  You may be able to summon more with a higher level in this spell.
translation: 一只小猫头鹰熊孵出来为你服务。在这个法术中，你可以用更高的等级召唤更多。

original: Instill a great fear wihin the minds of your foes!
translation: 给你的敌人灌输巨大的恐惧！

original: Causes elongated, jagged icicles to form in the air above the target, falling and damaging it.
translation: 在目标上方的空气中形成细长的锯齿状冰柱，落下并破坏目标。

original: Your eyes glow green for a moment.  Now your sight can pierce the darkest shadows.
translation: 你的眼睛闪着绿光。现在你的视力可以穿透最黑暗的阴影。

original: No darkness shall stand before ye and live!
translation: 没有黑暗站在你们面前而活！

original: Your hands infuse with the chill of ice, harming those whom they are placed upon.
translation: 你的手充满了冰的寒意，伤害了那些被放在你手上的人。

original: You channel endurance into magical energy.  You spend stamina to regain mana.
translation: 你将耐力转化为魔法能量。你花费耐力来恢复法力。

original: You blast a cone of freezing air toward the target.
translation: 你向目标发射一个冰锥状的空气。

original: Your rath itself manifests your gaze, crippling those whom you hate.
translation: 你的怒气本身就显出你的凝视，使你所恨的人残废。

original: You project a glowing white crystal of ice and it explodes on impact into a blossom of deathly chill.
translation: 你投射出一个发光的白色冰晶，它在撞击时爆炸成一朵致命的寒花。

original: You are quite certian you saw this in a game somewhere. A crackling beam of energy streaks toward your foes.
translation: 你很确定你在某个地方的游戏中看到了这个。一道噼啪作响的能量束向你的敌人飞来。

original: A gust of freezing wind comes forth, freezing your opponents in place!
translation: 一阵寒风吹来，把你的对手冻僵在原地！

original: Black flame springs forth from your hand, as energy engulfs your foes, wasting them to dust.
translation: 黑色的火焰从你的手中冒出，能量吞没了你的敌人，将他们化为乌有。

original: Encases your feet in a magical coating of ice, allowing you to glide along smooth surfaces at extreme speeds.
translation: 将你的双脚包裹在一层神奇的冰层中，让你以极快的速度沿着光滑的表面滑行。

original: pair of extremely slick icy coatings on your feet
translation: 你的脚上有一层非常光滑的冰层

original: An ethereal hand forms to assist you.
Several ethereal-looking zombies rise from the depths of the earth to fight for you.  You may be able to summon more with a higher level in this spell.
translation: 几个看起来空灵的僵尸从地球深处升起为你战斗。在这个法术中，你可以用更高的等级召唤更多。

original: Spews a line of acid from your mouth.
A magical, flying hand, summoned by someone or something.
translation: 一只神奇的、会飞的手，被某人或某物召唤。

original: A small book, which appears to be upon a role-palying game, though the section on spells seems rather strange...
translation: 一本关于角色扮演游戏的小书，虽然关于咒语的部分看起来很奇怪。。。

original: Thine armour hath been forged from some foul daemon, which provides ye unrivaled protection from their fires!.
translation: 你的盔甲是由一个邪恶的恶魔锻造而成，它为你提供了无与伦比的保护，使你免受他们的攻击！。

original: A magical hand appears before you.
translation: 一只神奇的手出现在你面前。

original: A magical slick icy coating on your feet.  While extremely fast on flat floors, they make it difficult to move on rough terrain.
translation: 你的脚上有一层神奇的光滑的冰层。虽然在平坦的地面上速度极快，但在崎岖不平的地形上很难移动。
魔法大师的爆能施法者

original: You blast a cone of force towards a target.
translation: 你向一个目标发射一个力锥。

original: Ghostly skeletons rise from the depths of the earth to fight for you.  You may be able to summon more with a higher level in this spell.
translation: 幽灵般的骷髅从地球深处升起，为你而战。在这个法术中，你可以用更高的等级召唤更多。

original: You hurl a baseball-sized glowing orb that, when reaches its target or an obstacle, produces a pressure-less blast of searing heat.
translation: 你投掷一个棒球大小的发光球体，当它到达目标或障碍物时，产生一个无压力的灼热爆炸。

original: A small book. Taking a look, it contains several spells, some of which you may know well!
translation: 一本小书。看一看，它包含了几个咒语，其中一些你可能很清楚！

original: Exists only for testing purposes. You dirty hacker!
translation: 仅用于测试目的。你这个肮脏的黑客！

original: Decrepit-looking large cats rises from the depths of the earth to fight for you.  You may be able to summon more with a higher level in this spell.
translation: 面容憔悴的大猫从地球深处冒出来为你而战。在这个法术中，你可以用更高的等级召唤更多。

original: You fire a mid-range cone of searing heat.
translation: 你发射了一个中程的灼热锥。

original: This appears to be a college textbook on human anatomy, but looking through the pages.. it seems to contain several spells on the raising of corpses, as though the skull on the cover never gave it away.
translation: 这似乎是一本关于人体解剖学的大学教科书，但翻阅一下书页。。它似乎包含了几个关于尸体复活的咒语，好像封面上的头骨从来没有泄露过。

original: Muscular corpses rise from the earth to defend you. You may be able to summon more with a higher level in this spell.
translation: 肌肉发达的尸体从地上升起来保护你。在这个法术中，你可以用更高的等级召唤更多。

original: Creates intense flame at a location, harming the target.
translation: 在某个位置产生强烈的火焰，伤害目标。

original: A small, leather-bound book. It appears to be the diary of Stephen Worsdin, a gravedigger, and his accounts of work at the Barovian Private Cemetary.
translation: 皮面装订的小书。这似乎是一个掘墓人斯蒂芬·沃斯丁的日记，以及他在巴罗维亚私人墓地的工作记录。

original: Many ethereal-looking zombies rise from the depths of the earth to fight for you.  You may be able to summon more with a higher level in this spell.
translation: 许多看起来空灵的僵尸从地球深处升起为你而战。在这个法术中，你可以用更高的等级召唤更多。

original: Your hands combust, damaging those whom you place them upon.
translation: 你的手会燃烧，伤害你放在上面的人。

original: A red, leather-bound book, sporting a mosaic of fire upon its cover. The contents seem to glow red once gazed upon.
translation: 一本红色的皮面书，封面上有一幅火的马赛克图案。一眼望去，里面的东西似乎都红了。

original: The dead shall rise and shamble the earth, and the dead shall outnumber the living!
translation: 死人必起来，使地摇摇欲坠，死人必比活人多！

original: A small tome upon crematories, which seems quite informational. The chapter upon cremation seems quite strange...
translation: 一本关于火葬场的小册子，似乎很有参考价值。关于火葬的章节似乎很奇怪。。。

original: Several ghostly skeletons rise from the depths of the earth to fight for you.  You may be able to summon more with a higher level in this spell.
translation: 几具幽灵般的骷髅从地球深处升起，为你而战。在这个法术中，你可以用更高的等级召唤更多。

original: A fantasy novel, which regales the reader upon tales of fictonal barbarians, dragons, and other such things.
translation: 一部奇幻小说，以反复无常的野蛮人、龙和其他诸如此类的故事取悦读者。

original: A squadrant of ghastly skeletons rise from the depths of the earth to fight for you.  You may be able to summon more with a higher level in this spell.
translation: 一群可怕的骷髅从地球深处冒出来为你而战。在这个法术中，你可以用更高的等级召唤更多。

original: A publication of a personal journal upon the Ice King, and his penguin, Gunter, detailing their personal accounts of their lives.
translation: 一本关于冰王和他的企鹅冈特的个人日记，详细描述了他们的生活。

original: A light, magically conjured longbow.  A matching conjured arrow appears when you draw the string back for firing. This one seems rather weak.
translation: 一种轻而神奇的长弓。一个匹配的变戏法箭头出现时，你拉线回来射击。这个看起来很弱。

original: Major and/or minor expansions to the Magiclysm modification.
translation: Magiclysm修改的主要和/或次要扩展。

original: An engine, similar in model to that of steam, but using crystalized mana to heat water instead of coal. You can see a Technomancer rune embedded upon it.
translation: 一种发动机，与蒸汽发动机的模型相似，但使用结晶的魔法来加热水而不是煤。你可以看到一个嵌在上面的科技人符文。

original: A blue, iridescent mushroom. It seems to contain magical power
translation: 一种蓝色、彩虹色的蘑菇。似乎蕴含着神奇的力量

original: You once found a pamphlet with bright colors claiming you can be a Wizard. After some study, you feel as though you understand this well.
translation: 你曾经发现一本色彩鲜艳的小册子，声称你可以成为一名巫师。经过一番研究，你觉得你好像很明白这一点。

original: Prior to the Cataclysm, you discovered the world of magic from a local wizard. You decided to create a new spell, one day, and someone told the Dracionic heads, exiling you for it. You then became a hermit, living alone in a cabin, studying magical theory and spell reserch, safe within your isolated home when the Cataclysm struck. You doubt the zombies know how to resist magical attacks.
translation: 在大灾变之前，你从一个当地的巫师那里发现了魔法世界。你决定创造一个新的咒语，有一天，有人告诉德拉西奥的头，驱逐你。然后你就成了一个隐士，独自一人住在小屋里，学习魔法理论和咒语研究，在大灾变发生时安全地呆在你与世隔绝的家里。你怀疑僵尸会抵抗魔法攻击。

original: This appears to be a compound of someones notes contained within a compsition book. It features several illistrations and recipies for... serum?
translation: 这似乎是一个复合的某人笔记包含在一个编曲书。它的特点是为…提供了几项收入和报酬。。。血清？

original: You were once shunned for your magic. You're alive, something most of the Dracionic heads cannot claim.
translation: 你曾经因为你的魔法而被回避。你还活着，这是大多数德拉西奥人无法宣称的。

original: You stumbled across a nest of Demon Spiders. Harkened to the legends of powerful artifacts, you ventured inside. Of course, you were spotted, and wounded in combat. Now in pain, and having spotted what appeared to be a massive spider, you plan upon retreat. You may only hope that your passing is not here.
translation: 你无意中发现了一窝恶魔蜘蛛。听了传说中的强大的文物，你冒险进去。当然，你被发现了，在战斗中受伤了。现在在痛苦中，发现了一只巨大的蜘蛛，你计划撤退。你只希望你的过世不在这里。
挑战-德拉西奥尼克突袭者

original: The son of a weatherman, you were always interested in the weather.  Some time ago you found it was possible to manipulate the weather yourself through arcane means!  Unfortunately you did not have long to enjoy your power, as events unfolded...
translation: 天气预报员的儿子，你总是对天气感兴趣。前段时间，你发现自己可以通过神秘的方式操纵天气！不幸的是，你没有很长时间来享受你的力量，随着事态的发展。。。

original: You found the lair of a black dragon one day. Seeking powerful magics, you ventured inside. Despite your attempts to bypass the gaurds, you were spotted, ensuing combat. You were wounded in the frenzy, and you wish not to pass here.
translation: 有一天你发现了一条黑龙的巢穴。寻找强大的魔法，你冒险进去。尽管你试图绕过高德人，你还是被发现了，接下来的战斗。你在狂乱中受了伤，你不想经过这里。

original: A small guide, composed for the aspiring alchemist.
translation: 为有抱负的炼金术士撰写的小指南。

original: You always had a passion for control in powerful frost and flame. The advancements of Archlord Kelvin were just what you wanted.
translation: 你总是热衷于控制强大的冰霜和火焰。开尔文大领主的进步正是你想要的。

original: You always had a passion for control in powerful frost and flame, and recived some schooling within the Kelvinic arts. What you shall use your knowledge for remains to be seen.
translation: 你总是热衷于控制强大的冰霜和火焰，并接受了凯尔文艺术的一些教育。你要用你的知识做什么还有待观察。

original: copies of Staff of the Magi
translation: 三博士工作人员的副本

original: A tome upon imbuning magical energy within items for direction into molding spacetime, aimed specifically for Magi.
translation: 这是一本将魔法能量注入物品以引导时空的大部头书，专门针对三博士。

original: You always were tough in a fight. Your coach taught you more than a few tricks.
translation: 你打起来总是很强硬。你的教练教你的不仅仅是一些技巧。

original: With the recent Cataclysm, the several ways you found to cheat on tests may have to find some other use.
translation: 在最近的大灾难中，你发现的几种作弊方法可能还有其他用处。

original: copies of Artificers of Frost and Flame
translation: 冰霜与火焰之神的副本

original: A tome upon imbuning magical energy within items for direction into frost and flame, aimed specifically for Kelvinists.
translation: 一本关于将魔法能量注入冰霜和火焰的书，专门针对凯尔文主义者。

original: A tome upon imbuning magical energy within items for direction into animation, aimed specifically for Animists.
translation: 一本关于将魔法能量注入动画的书，专门针对万物有灵论者。

original: A tome upon imbuning magical energy within items for direction into the natural world, aimed specifically for Druids.
translation: 一本关于在物品中注入魔法能量以引导进入自然世界的书，专门针对德鲁伊。

original: A tome upon imbuning magical energy within items for direction into earthworks, aimed specifically for Earthshapers.
translation: 一本关于将魔法能量注入土方工程的书，专门针对地球塑造者。

original: copies of The Powers of Electricity
A tome upon imbuning magical energy within items for direction into various weathers, aimed specifically for Stormshapers.
translation: 一本关于将魔法能量注入各种天气的书，专门针对风暴塑造者。

original: A tome upon imbuning magical energy within items for direction into various technological devices, aimed specifically for Technomancers.
translation: 一本将魔法能量注入各种技术装置的书，专门针对技术能手。

original: copies of Alterations of the Flesh
A tome upon imbuning magical energy within items for direction into the metamorphics of biological material, aimed specifically for Biomancers.
translation: 一本关于将魔法能量注入到生物材料的变形中的书，专门针对生物癌症。

original: A storage space for holding solid fuels, this one designed for solid fuels of magical nature. If filled with the appropriate fuel for the vehicle's engine, the engine will automatically draw fuel from the tank when the engine is on.
translation: 一个储存固体燃料的空间，这个空间是为魔法性质的固体燃料设计的。如果为车辆发动机加注了适当的燃油，发动机将在发动机启动时自动从油箱中抽取燃油。

original: A bin for holding solid fuel, this one designed specificaly for solid magical fuels.
translation: 用来装固体燃料的箱子，这是专门为固体燃料设计的。

original: Spores of the magic mushroom. They radiate slightly.
translation: 神奇蘑菇的孢子。它们有轻微的辐射。
